1.0.name: wordpress/facebook-like-send-button
1.0.description:
This very simple plugin adds a small JS file to your header to let this happen!

  • Facebook Like & Send Button plugin homepage.
  • More WordPress Plugins.
  • Follow @alexmoss on Twitter.
  • Alex Moss.
  • SEO Manchester.

You can also insert the buttons as shortcodes into any post, page or template and use your own settings for each time you do it! Simply use the shortcode [fblikesend]
